exercises.name: Wall Sit (Shallow)
exercises.notes: Slide into a shallow wall sit, keep knees aligned over feet, and breathe steadily.

exercises.name: Straight Leg Raise
exercises.notes: Lift your straight leg to hip height with your core braced, then lower with control.

exercises.name: Terminal Knee Extension
exercises.notes: Extend your knee into terminal extension, hold for 3 seconds, then return with control.

exercises.name: Backward Step-Up
exercises.notes: Use a 4-inch step and move slowly, taking about 3 seconds up and 3 seconds down per rep.

exercises.name: Sit-to-Stand
exercises.notes: Stand up and sit down slowly with controlled form through each rep.

exercises.name: Spanish Squat Hold
exercises.notes: Maintain the Spanish squat position for 45 seconds each rep while keeping steady tension.

exercises.name: Low Step Downs
exercises.notes: Use a low step and lower with control, keeping your knee tracking over your toes.
